skins.shipDescription: Sovetsky Soyuz-class battleship C Sovetskaya Rossiya.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Sovetskaya Rossiya, of Project 23. I was part of a strategic plan during the war, but for several reasons never came to be. I see though that I can prove my value here in this fleet with a series of decisive victories.
skins.acquisition: I am called "Sovetskaya Rossiya," and as the mightiest of all the Northern Parliament's battleships, I am her ultimate weapon. I will press onward to eliminate all obstacles that stand between you and the Revolution.
skins.login: Comrade Commander, you are late. You must not forget your proletarian values.
skins.details: Is that you, Comrade Commander...? I'm afraid the office is a bit messy. But we must make sacrifices to achieve our goals.
skins.secretaryIdle1: A report I submitted went missing? Pardon my negligence. I'll make it up, so... please don't tell the others about this matter.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I hope that you can command from a global perspective. After all, the responsibility on your shoulders is much greater than just that of an individual.
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I was inspecting my rigging, I noticed a few more screws than last time... Hm, an unexpected "increase in resource allocation?" That's a good thing, right?
skins.secretaryIdle4: Your tactics are too conservative! As long as it has not been sunk, it can repaired, learned from, strengthened, and optimized... Continuing this cycle is the best way of fighting.
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to deepen our camaraderie? Very good, let us start by making a firm handshake part of our regular routine.

skins.shipDescription: "Situation normal in all sectors of the facility..." Oh, it is you. I was just giving Minsk the daily report. Do you have something?
skins.acquisition: "Situation normal in all sectors of the facility..." Oh, it is you. I was just giving Minsk the daily report. Do you have something?
skins.login: Facility inspection, watch patrol, and observations conducted in accordance with regulations. Everything running smoothly.
skins.details: What is the most efficient way to dispose of... Ooh? I mean the refuse. Spare me that look of concern.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You find me more reliable than Gangut...? I am glad you see my value, but I find that a very low bar to clear.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This is all in service of a greater cause. The girls have fully committed their labor. You need not trouble yourself.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Document classification protocols...? I was trying to find the required materials, but seem to have created a bit of a mess in the process...
skins.secretaryTouch: Now, your hand... For today's handshake. I am not going to clap you in irons. Relax.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hmph. Do you want to be handcuffed?
